00299 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00300 
00301 inline pandora::StatusCode DumpPfosMonitoringAlgorithm::DumpPhotonPfo(const pandora::ParticleFlowObject *pPfo)
00302 {
00303     return this->DumpNeutralOrPhotonPfo(pPfo, true);
00304 }
00305 
00306 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00307 
00308 inline pandora::StatusCode DumpPfosMonitoringAlgorithm::DumpNeutralPfo(const pandora::ParticleFlowObject *pPfo)
00309 {
00310     return this->DumpNeutralOrPhotonPfo(pPfo, false);
00311 }

00316 inline pandora::Algorithm *DumpPfosMonitoringAlgorithm::Factory::CreateAlgorithm() const
00317 {
00318     return new DumpPfosMonitoringAlgorithm();
00319 }
